scripts.prettier:plugin:raw: pnpm run build:types && pnpm exec -- prettier $npm_config_path --plugin=$npm_package_config_root_path/dist/src/plugin-entry.js --ignore-path=$npm_package_config_root_path/../cli/.prettierignore --ignore-unknown --log-level=warn --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern
scripts.prettier:plugin: pnpm run build:types && pnpm --filter @gml-modules/cli run build:types && node ../cli/dist/index.js $npm_config_path
